answers.answer: When was the last time you saw your Dr.?  It is so important to take care of your feet with diabetes!  How often are you checking your blood sugar?  I would take better care of myself if I were you.  Good Luck.

question: I have been a type II Diabetic for ten years. My feet have been swollen for one year. Two weeks ago I pulled some weeds and I have not been able to use  my legs to walk unlless  I use crutches. I wonder if this is related to my diabectic history. My blood was 340 last time tested.
title: Mike 73
